Original:
酒款豐富，老闆細心介紹，也很大方的請試喝。
-
- 智惠美人 紅茶梅酒 $880 紅茶（阿薩姆風味）+梅酒+白蘭地，不會太甜，很順口好喝的一支酒！
- 上等知覽茶 綠茶梅酒 $850/720ml 入口先是茶葉沖泡出的綠茶香氣，接著是不會太甜梅酒味跟淡淡的茶葉的苦澀味，最後帶出茶葉的回甘。茶香味濃郁，很特別！最喜歡這支！
- 八河 京都抹茶梅酒 $950 比較淡的抹茶味，印象中聽老闆介紹這隻是抹茶跟梅酒分開釀，之後再混和的，偏酸的梅酒味道比較突出。
- 神聖 山本本家 抹茶酒 $590 抹茶+清酒，比八河抹茶梅酒的抹茶味稍重一點，並帶有點米釀的香氣。抹茶的部分就是有點抹茶的粉感，但不苦不澀，有點回甘，好像酒裡用大抹茶大多都是這種口味，跟常見的抹茶有些許不同。老闆推薦可以加牛奶。
- 青 柚子酒（狗狗瓶身） $850/720ml $1700/1800ml 很甜很可愛的味道，柚子味跟酒感都較淡。
- 猫の惠 白猫桃桃（貓貓瓶身） $850/720ml 很濃郁的桃子香氣超讚，老闆介紹說是沒有去皮的桃子一起釀造，且留有果泥沒有過濾的桃子酒，適合加氣泡水。
- 杉上柚雅 海鹽柚子酒  $990/720ml $1980/1800ml 柚子茶的味道，很清爽好喝。
- 萬作之花 優格酒 $450/300ml （$4800/12罐）優格本人！但跟酒融合的很順口，個人很喜歡！（自己加抹茶也好好喝。）
EN:
The wine is rich, and the boss introduces it carefully, and it is also very generous to try.
-
-The Zhihui beauty black tea plum wine $ 880 black tea (Assam flavor)+plum wine+Bailan land, it will not be too sweet, very delicious wine!
-Mextable tea green tea plum wine $ 850/720ml The entrance is the aroma brewed green tea brewed, and then it will not be too sweet and the bitter taste of the taste of tea, and finally bring out the tea back.Tea is rich and special!I like this most!
-The Matcha Plum Wine of Bayhe Kyoto is a lighter matcha flavor. In the impression, the boss introduced that this was just separated from Matcha and plum wine, and then mixed with it. The sour plum wine taste is more prominent.
-Suno Yamamoto's Matcha wine $ 590 matcha+sake, which is slightly heavier than the matcha tea of ​​Bathe Matchamei wine, and has the aroma of rice brewing.The part of matcha is a bit of matcha powder, but it is not bitter or astringent. It is a bit sweet. It seems that most of the wine in the wine is mostly this taste, which is a little different from the common matcha.The boss recommends that you can add milk.
-Guoyu wine (dog bottle body) $ 850/720ml $ 1700/1800ml is very sweet and cute, and the grapefruit flavor and wine are lighter.
-The Hui White Cat Peach (Cat Cat Bottle) $ 850/720ml The rich peach is superb. The boss introduced that it is brewed with peaches that are not peeled, and there are peach wines that are not filtered with fruit mud. Bubble water.
-Sugakuya Yahai salt grapefruit wine $ 990/720ml $ 1980/1800ml grapefruit tea, it is very refreshing and delicious.
-Wen Mu Flower Gegel $ 450/300ml ($ 4800/12 can) Yoguk himself!But the fusion with wine is very smooth, personally like it!(It is also delicious to add matcha yourself.)
